snippet.title: Enjoy great family reading, by gum
snippet.content: HUGH Hayward is well on his way to passing down his favourite tales to his daughter Marlowe. The two-year-old is enjoying classics such as Tales From The Gum Tree, which features a set of characters close to Mr Hayward's heart. "I remember the characters from when I was a kid," he said. "It's nice to be able to share these stories and have that nostalgia. The good old days and values are still around to be passed on to our kids." For your copy of Tales From The Gum Tree collect your token from today's Cairns Post and redeem it at participating newsagents, Woolworths and IGA stores for $2.30.
